alert.note: Alert for Iredell; Rowan (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 1:33PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN IREDELL AND SOUTHWESTERN ROWAN COUNTIES UNTIL 200 PM EDT... At 133 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm 11 miles northwest of Kannapolis, or 5 miles northeast of Mooresville. This storm was nearly stationary. Locations to be impacted include... Cleveland, Mooresville and Mount Ulla. Very heavy rainfall rates up to 2 inches per hour will be possible in these areas.
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall may flood areas with poor drainage, such as ditches and underpasses. Avoid these areas and do not cross flooded roads. Water levels of small streams may also rise rapidly. Seek higher ground if threatened by flood waters.
